com.github.sarxos.webcam

Enum WebcamPanel.DrawMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WebcamPanel.DrawMode>
      • com.github.sarxos.webcam.WebcamPanel.DrawMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<WebcamPanel.DrawMode>
    Enclosing class:
    WebcamPanel

    public static enum WebcamPanel.DrawMode
extends Enum<WebcamPanel.DrawMode>
    This enum is to control of how image will be drawn in the panel bounds.
    Author:
    Sylwia Kauczor

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FILL
      Will resize image to the panel bounds.
      FIT
      Will fir image into the panel bounds.
      NONE
      Do not resize image - paint it as it is.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WebcamPanel.DrawMode valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static WebcamPanel.DrawMode[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Enum

        compareTo, equals, getDeclaringClass, hashCode, name, ordinal, toString, valueOf

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NONE

        public static final WebcamPanel.DrawMode NONE
        Do not resize image - paint it as it is. This will make the image to go off out the bounds if panel is smaller than image size.

      • FILL

        public static final WebcamPanel.DrawMode FILL
        Will resize image to the panel bounds. This mode does not care of the image scale, so the final image may be disrupted.

      • FIT

        public static final WebcamPanel.DrawMode FIT
        Will fir image into the panel bounds. This will resize the image and keep both x and y scale factor.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static WebcamPanel.DrawMode[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (WebcamPanel.DrawMode c : WebcamPanel.DrawMode.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
